projects.title: weatherApp
projects.description: The Weather App is an application that allows users to search for the temperature of a country based on the zip code of the area. Users can also log how they feel today.

projects.title: DS-restaurant using Next.js
projects.description: Menu Food is a website that displays different food categories for breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Users can filter the categories by meal type, and they can also search for specific categories

projects.title: company
projects.description: This site is useful for use by small and medium companies to display their products and services, and it is also responsive on all screens.

projects.title: clothe Store
projects.description: An online store showcasing clothing products, implementing discounts displayed dynamically from databases, with a shopping cart functionality and login/sign-in pages.
